Package com.tapad.tapestry

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TapestryCallback
    A callback that handles a TapestryResponse asynchronously.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildConfig  
    ConnectionStatusExecutor
    Only executes Runnables when a network connection becomes available.
    Logging
    Convenience class to log using com.tapad as log tag.
    TapestryClient
    A client for sending requests to the Tapestry Web API and returning responses.
    TapestryError
    Represents an error that occurred in sending a request to Tapestry.
    TapestryRequest
    A mutable class for building requests that are sent with TapestryClient.
    TapestryResponse
    Contains information about this device and devices connected to it in the device graph, as a result of sending a request to TapestryClient.
    TapestryService
    The TapestryService is a singleton (static) wrapper for the TapestryClient to provide one point of initialization.
    TapestryTracking
    Extracts information from the Android Context.
    TapestryUICallback
    A convenience class for running callbacks in the Android UI thread.
